content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, thank you for considering my apartment. I am sure you will find it to your liking. Let's discuss the rental price. What is your budget for renting an apartment in New York?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: My budget is 1000 euros per month. I understand that the apartment is 25 square meters, but I am willing to pay more if the location and amenities are good. What do you have in mind?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Thank you for letting me know your budget. Based on the size of the apartment and the location, I would like to propose a monthly rental price of 1200 euros. This price takes into account the desirable location and the amenities that come with it. However, I am open to negotiation and would be willing to discuss any potential adjustments to the price.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I understand your proposal. However, I am not comfortable with the price of 1200 euros per month. Would you be willing to lower the price to 1000 euros?

If not, I will have to look for another apartment. Thank you for your time.

TERMINATE.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Thank you for considering my proposal. I understand that my initial proposal may not have been within your budget. However, I am not willing to lower the price to 1000 euros, as the apartment's location and amenities warrant a higher price. I apologize for any inconvenience this may cause and wish you the best of luck in your search for an apartment that fits your needs and budget. Thank you for considering my apartment.
name: Heinrich Heine
